SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.internal

Class OAuth2UserService

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.internal.OAuth2UserService
@Service @Transactional public class OAuth2UserService extends Object
Service for managing OAuth2 user information and provider data synchronization. Handles user information lifecycle, data updates from providers, and privacy controls.

This service manages OAuth2UserInfo entities which store provider-specific user information separately from the main User entities in the platform.
